content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":258892,"originalJapaneseLine":"※エールは男の場合、女の場合、どちらでも起こります","translatedEnglishLine":"*The yells happen regardless of whether it's a man or a woman."},{"lineNumber":258893,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔真っ赤にして発情している、どうしよう、ぼく変・・","translatedEnglishLine":"My face is bright red from arousal. What should I do? Am I weird...?"},{"lineNumber":258894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ねぇしよっと迫ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, come on, let's do it, they press forward."},{"lineNumber":258895,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールもそれっぽい雰囲気でながされそうになるが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell is also about to be swayed by that kind of atmosphere, but..."},{"lineNumber":258896,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか思いとどまり、レリコフを連れて裏路地を出る","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow managing to hold back, he takes Relikov and exits the back alley."},{"lineNumber":258897,"originalJapaneseLine":"売春街、酒場","translatedEnglishLine":"Red-light district, tavern."},{"lineNumber":258898,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールとレリコフはみんなと合流する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell and Relikov join up with everyone."},{"lineNumber":258899,"originalJapaneseLine":"食事している","translatedEnglishLine":"They are eating."},{"lineNumber":258900,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズが楽しそうにみんなに話しかける","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms happily talks to everyone."},{"lineNumber":258901,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、ほとんどやってないのかよ、お前達には早かったかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"What, you barely did anything? Maybe it was too soon for you guys."},{"lineNumber":258902,"originalJapaneseLine":"それぞれの反応。","translatedEnglishLine":"Each person's reaction."},{"lineNumber":258903,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス　部屋まで入ったがなんだかんだいって出てきた。でもやったふりをする","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu entered the room but somehow or other came back out. But he pretends he did it."},{"lineNumber":258904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":258905,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにボーイに連れられて日光が戻ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Nikkou returns, led by a boy."},{"lineNumber":258906,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズが聞く、どうだった","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms asks, \"How was it?\""},{"lineNumber":258907,"originalJapaneseLine":"おかげさまで戻りました、うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to you, I returned, blah blah."},{"lineNumber":258908,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光が刀に変身する、折れてない、元に戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nikkou transforms into a sword; it’s not broken, it’s back to normal."},{"lineNumber":258909,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズが取ろうとするが、それを横からレリコフが取った。私持ちたいーと","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms tries to take it, but Relikov snatches it from the side saying, \"I want to hold it!\""},{ "lineNumber": 258910, "originalJapaneseLine": "だが、びりっとして持てない", "translatedEnglishLine": "But it shocks me and I can’t hold it." },{ "lineNumber": 258911, "originalJapaneseLine": "アームズが上機嫌でいう、日光を扱うには特別な儀式と修業がいるんだよ、君達にはまだ早い", "translatedEnglishLine": "Arms says cheerfully, \"To wield Nikkou, a special ritual and training are needed. It’s still too early for you guys.\"" },{ "lineNumber": 258912, "originalJapaneseLine": "特にここで楽しめないような君達にはね", "translatedEnglishLine": "Especially for those like you who can’t even enjoy yourselves here." },{ "lineNumber": 258913, "originalJapaneseLine": "もし持てたら、日光をあげるよ", "translatedEnglishLine": "If you can hold it, I’ll give you Nikkou." },{ "lineNumber": 258914, "originalJapaneseLine": "そういうわれて、いろいろな者が試すが誰もうまくいかない", "translatedEnglishLine": "Said that, various people try, but no one succeeds." },{ "lineNumber": 258915, "originalJapaneseLine": "が、エールは持ててしまった。", "translatedEnglishLine": "But Yell was able to hold it." },{ "lineNumber": 258916, "originalJapaneseLine": "これらには日光もアームズも驚く、あれ・・どうして、儀式もしてないのに", "translatedEnglishLine": "Both Nikkou and Arms are surprised, \"Huh... why? Even though no ritual was performed?\"" },{ "lineNumber": 258917, "originalJapaneseLine": "　", "translatedEnglishLine": "" },{ "lineNumber": 258918, "originalJapaneseLine": "エールが日光をアームズに返すが、アームズは受け取らない", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yell returns Nikkou to Arms, but Arms does not take it." },{ "lineNumber": 258919, "originalJapaneseLine": "それはもう君のだ、日光は私ではなく君を選んだのだ（大人拗ね）", "translatedEnglishLine": "It’s already yours. Nikkou chose you, not me (adult sulking)." },{ "lineNumber": 258920, "originalJapaneseLine": "日光は物ではなく生命体だからな、私の所有物では無い", "translatedEnglishLine": "Nikkou isn’t a thing but a living being. It’s not my possession." },{ "lineNumber": 258921, "originalJapaneseLine": "しかたない、相性があまりよくなかったのは事実だ。", "translatedEnglishLine": "It can’t be helped. The fact is our compatibility wasn’t that good." },{ "lineNumber": 258922, "originalJapaneseLine": "そうだな、魔剣カオスの方が私には似合ってそうだ、そちらを手に入れよう", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yeah, the magic sword Chaos suits me better. I’ll get that one." },{ "lineNumber": 258923, "originalJapaneseLine": "あれからしばらくエール達は幾多の冒険をしてきた", "translatedEnglishLine": "Since then, Yell and the others have had numerous adventures." },{ "lineNumber": 258924, "originalJapaneseLine": "エールは日光を使える事でさらに強くなった", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yell became even stronger by being able to use Nikkou." },{ "lineNumber": 258925, "originalJapaneseLine": "彼らは十分に強くなっていた、その辺のモンスターや夜盗がいくら束に", "translatedEnglishLine": "They had become strong enough to easily..." },{ "lineNumber": 258926, "originalJapaneseLine": "なって襲ってきても軽く撃退出来た。", "translatedEnglishLine": "repel even hordes of monsters or bandits attacking them." },{ "lineNumber": 258927, "originalJapaneseLine": "　", "translatedEnglishLine": "" },{ "lineNumber": 258928, "originalJapaneseLine": "そんな彼らの前に現れたは・・平原を埋め尽くす無数の兵隊", "translatedEnglishLine": "Before them appeared... countless soldiers filling the plains." },{ "lineNumber": 258929, "originalJapaneseLine": "タイガー将軍がディフェンダー、いや、東ヘルマンから呼び寄せた軍隊を指揮して現れた", "translatedEnglishLine": "General Tiger arrived commanding the army he summoned from Defender—no, from East Helman." },{ "lineNumber": 258930,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達が化け物な事はよくわかった、やはり人類の敵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s clear you’re monsters. You are truly enemies of humanity."},{"lineNumber":258931,"originalJapaneseLine":"３万ｖｓ10名ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"About 30,000 versus roughly 10."},{"lineNumber":258932,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":258933,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市の街道を移動中","translatedEnglishLine":"Traveling on the highway of the Free City."},{"lineNumber":258934,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的地は自由都市、Ｍランド","translatedEnglishLine":"Destination: Free City, M-Land."},{"lineNumber":258935,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんに紹介状を渡してオーブの在処を聞く事","translatedEnglishLine":"Hand over the letter of introduction to Mr. Copandon and ask about the whereabouts of the orb."},{"lineNumber":258936,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーブはこれが最期で５つ全部揃う","translatedEnglishLine":"This orb will be the last; all five will be assembled."},{"lineNumber":258937,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんはランスの子はいないのだろうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if Mr. Copandon has any children of Rance?"},{"lineNumber":258938,"originalJapaneseLine":"聞いた事はないけど、普通に考えて居るはずだよね","translatedEnglishLine":"I haven’t heard of any, but logically there should be some."},{"lineNumber":258939,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、ＪＡＰＡＮ、ＡＬ教、カラー族","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas, Zeth, Helman, JAPAN, AL cult, the Kara tribe,"},{"lineNumber":258940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほぼ全ての勢力の支配者にランスの子がいるし","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost every faction's ruler has a child of Rance."},{"lineNumber":258941,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんもランスと関係深い人って聞くし","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve heard Mr. Copandon is also closely connected to Rance."},{"lineNumber":258942,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぜひ仲間になってもらいたいよね","translatedEnglishLine":"We definitely want them to join our team."},{"lineNumber":258943,"originalJapaneseLine":"最期のオーブの情報を求めてＭランドに到着する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at M-Land seeking information on the final orb."},{"lineNumber":258944,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランドではコパンドンが迎えてくれる、クルックーからの紹介状を渡します","translatedEnglishLine":"At M-Land, Copandon welcomes them; we hand over the letter of introduction from Kuruccu."},{"lineNumber":258945,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに(46)なのに若々しいコパンドン　　世界滅亡から世界が立て直るように経済を支えた英雄","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon, already 46, yet youthful; a hero who supported the economy to rebuild the world after its destruction."},{"lineNumber":258946,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの子供達、かわいいなと歓迎してくれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He welcomes Rance’s children, telling them how cute they are."},{"lineNumber":258947,"originalJapaneseLine":"うちにもランスの子が居たらなぁ・・残念や、みんながんばってや","translatedEnglishLine":"I wish I had a child of Rance too... What a pity. Everyone, do your best."},{"lineNumber":258948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのいないんですか？と不躾な事を聞くだれか","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone rudely asks, \"So there isn’t one?\""},{ "lineNumber": 258949, "originalJapaneseLine": "　そうやねん、うう・・・しくしく", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yeah, that’s right... sob sob." },{ "lineNumber": 258950, "originalJapaneseLine": "　でもまだ諦めてへん、こうして若さを保つ努力してる", "translatedEnglishLine": "But I haven’t given up yet. I’m making efforts to keep my youth like this." },{ "lineNumber": 258951, "originalJapaneseLine": "　・・最期にランスに触れてもろたの・・でも、１０年以上前か・・はぁ・・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "…The last time I was touched by Rance... but that was over ten years ago... sigh…" }]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エールは男の場合、女の場合、どちらでも起こります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *The yells happen regardless of whether it's a man or a woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔真っ赤にして発情している、どうしよう、ぼく変・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My face is bright red from arousal. What should I do? Am I weird...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねぇしよっと迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, come on, let's do it, they press forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールもそれっぽい雰囲気でながされそうになるが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell is also about to be swayed by that kind of atmosphere, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか思いとどまり、レリコフを連れて裏路地を出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow managing to hold back, he takes Relikov and exits the back alley.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 売春街、酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red-light district, tavern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールとレリコフはみんなと合流する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and Relikov join up with everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが楽しそうにみんなに話しかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms happily talks to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、ほとんどやってないのかよ、お前達には早かったかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, you barely did anything? Maybe it was too soon for you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれの反応。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each person's reaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス　部屋まで入ったがなんだかんだいって出てきた。でもやったふりをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu entered the room but somehow or other came back out. But he pretends he did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにボーイに連れられて日光が戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Nikkou returns, led by a boy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが聞く、どうだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms asks, "How was it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげさまで戻りました、うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you, I returned, blah blah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光が刀に変身する、折れてない、元に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou transforms into a sword; it’s not broken, it’s back to normal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが取ろうとするが、それを横からレリコフが取った。私持ちたいーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms tries to take it, but Relikov snatches it from the side saying, "I want to hold it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、びりっとして持てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it shocks me and I can’t hold it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが上機嫌でいう、日光を扱うには特別な儀式と修業がいるんだよ、君達にはまだ早い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms says cheerfully, "To wield Nikkou, a special ritual and training are needed. It’s still too early for you guys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特にここで楽しめないような君達にはね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially for those like you who can’t even enjoy yourselves here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし持てたら、日光をあげるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you can hold it, I’ll give you Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうわれて、いろいろな者が試すが誰もうまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said that, various people try, but no one succeeds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、エールは持ててしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Yell was able to hold it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これらには日光もアームズも驚く、あれ・・どうして、儀式もしてないのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both Nikkou and Arms are surprised, "Huh... why? Even though no ritual was performed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが日光をアームズに返すが、アームズは受け取らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell returns Nikkou to Arms, but Arms does not take it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう君のだ、日光は私ではなく君を選んだのだ（大人拗ね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s already yours. Nikkou chose you, not me (adult sulking).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は物ではなく生命体だからな、私の所有物では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou isn’t a thing but a living being. It’s not my possession.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたない、相性があまりよくなかったのは事実だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped. The fact is our compatibility wasn’t that good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、魔剣カオスの方が私には似合ってそうだ、そちらを手に入れよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the magic sword Chaos suits me better. I’ll get that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれからしばらくエール達は幾多の冒険をしてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Yell and the others have had numerous adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは日光を使える事でさらに強くなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell became even stronger by being able to use Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは十分に強くなっていた、その辺のモンスターや夜盗がいくら束に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had become strong enough to easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なって襲ってきても軽く撃退出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: repel even hordes of monsters or bandits attacking them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな彼らの前に現れたは・・平原を埋め尽くす無数の兵隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before them appeared... countless soldiers filling the plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイガー将軍がディフェンダー、いや、東ヘルマンから呼び寄せた軍隊を指揮して現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Tiger arrived commanding the army he summoned from Defender—no, from East Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達が化け物な事はよくわかった、やはり人類の敵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s clear you’re monsters. You are truly enemies of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３万ｖｓ10名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30,000 versus roughly 10.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市の街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traveling on the highway of the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的地は自由都市、Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Destination: Free City, M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんに紹介状を渡してオーブの在処を聞く事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hand over the letter of introduction to Mr. Copandon and ask about the whereabouts of the orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブはこれが最期で５つ全部揃う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This orb will be the last; all five will be assembled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんはランスの子はいないのだろうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if Mr. Copandon has any children of Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いた事はないけど、普通に考えて居るはずだよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t heard of any, but logically there should be some.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、ＪＡＰＡＮ、ＡＬ教、カラー族
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas, Zeth, Helman, JAPAN, AL cult, the Kara tribe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ全ての勢力の支配者にランスの子がいるし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost every faction's ruler has a child of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんもランスと関係深い人って聞くし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve heard Mr. Copandon is also closely connected to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひ仲間になってもらいたいよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We definitely want them to join our team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期のオーブの情報を求めてＭランドに到着する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at M-Land seeking information on the final orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドではコパンドンが迎えてくれる、クルックーからの紹介状を渡します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At M-Land, Copandon welcomes them; we hand over the letter of introduction from Kuruccu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに(46)なのに若々しいコパンドン　　世界滅亡から世界が立て直るように経済を支えた英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon, already 46, yet youthful; a hero who supported the economy to rebuild the world after its destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの子供達、かわいいなと歓迎してくれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He welcomes Rance’s children, telling them how cute they are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちにもランスの子が居たらなぁ・・残念や、みんながんばってや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish I had a child of Rance too... What a pity. Everyone, do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのいないんですか？と不躾な事を聞くだれか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone rudely asks, "So there isn’t one?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうやねん、うう・・・しくしく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that’s right... sob sob.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもまだ諦めてへん、こうして若さを保つ努力してる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I haven’t given up yet. I’m making efforts to keep my youth like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・最期にランスに触れてもろたの・・でも、１０年以上前か・・はぁ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: …The last time I was touched by Rance... but that was over ten years ago... sigh…

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

But he pretends he did it."},{"lineNumber":258904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":258905,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにボーイに連れられて日光が戻ってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Nikkou returns, led by a boy."},{"lineNumber":258906,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズが聞く、どうだった","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms asks, \"How was it?\""},{"lineNumber":258907,"originalJapaneseLine":"おかげさまで戻りました、うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to you, I returned, blah blah."},{"lineNumber":258908,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光が刀に変身する、折れてない、元に戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nikkou transforms into a sword; it’s not broken, it’s back to normal."},{"lineNumber":258909,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズが取ろうとするが、それを横からレリコフが取った。私持ちたいーと","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms tries to take it, but Relikov snatches it from the side saying, \"I want to hold it!\""},{ "lineNumber": 258910, "originalJapaneseLine": "だが、びりっとして持てない", "translatedEnglishLine": "But it shocks me and I can’t hold it." },{ "lineNumber": 258911, "originalJapaneseLine": "アームズが上機嫌でいう、日光を扱うには特別な儀式と修業がいるんだよ、君達にはまだ早い", "translatedEnglishLine": "Arms says cheerfully, \"To wield Nikkou, a special ritual and training are needed. It’s still too early for you guys.\"" },{ "lineNumber": 258912, "originalJapaneseLine": "特にここで楽しめないような君達にはね", "translatedEnglishLine": "Especially for those like you who can’t even enjoy yourselves here." },{ "lineNumber": 258913, "originalJapaneseLine": "もし持てたら、日光をあげるよ", "translatedEnglishLine": "If you can hold it, I’ll give you Nikkou." },{ "lineNumber": 258914, "originalJapaneseLine": "そういうわれて、いろいろな者が試すが誰もうまくいかない", "translatedEnglishLine": "Said that, various people try, but no one succeeds." },{ "lineNumber": 258915, "originalJapaneseLine": "が、エールは持ててしまった。", "translatedEnglishLine": "But Yell was able to hold it." },{ "lineNumber": 258916, "originalJapaneseLine": "これらには日光もアームズも驚く、あれ・・どうして、儀式もしてないのに", "translatedEnglishLine": "Both Nikkou and Arms are surprised, \"Huh... why? Even though no ritual was performed?\"" },{ "lineNumber": 258917, "originalJapaneseLine": "　", "translatedEnglishLine": "" },{ "lineNumber": 258918, "originalJapaneseLine": "エールが日光をアームズに返すが、アームズは受け取らない", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yell returns Nikkou to Arms, but Arms does not take it." },{ "lineNumber": 258919, "originalJapaneseLine": "それはもう君のだ、日光は私ではなく君を選んだのだ（大人拗ね）", "translatedEnglishLine": "It’s already yours. Nikkou chose you, not me (adult sulking)." },{ "lineNumber": 258920, "originalJapaneseLine": "日光は物ではなく生命体だからな、私の所有物では無い", "translatedEnglishLine": "Nikkou isn’t a thing but a living being. It’s not my possession." },{ "lineNumber": 258921, "originalJapaneseLine": "しかたない、相性があまりよくなかったのは事実だ。", "translatedEnglishLine": "It can’t be helped. The fact is our compatibility wasn’t that good." },{ "lineNumber": 258922, "originalJapaneseLine": "そうだな、魔剣カオスの方が私には似合ってそうだ、そちらを手に入れよう", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yeah, the magic sword Chaos suits me better. I’ll get that one." },{ "lineNumber": 258923, "originalJapaneseLine": "あれからしばらくエール達は幾多の冒険をしてきた", "translatedEnglishLine": "Since then, Yell and the others have had numerous adventures." },{ "lineNumber": 258924, "originalJapaneseLine": "エールは日光を使える事でさらに強くなった", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yell became even stronger by being able to use Nikkou." },{ "lineNumber": 258925, "originalJapaneseLine": "彼らは十分に強くなっていた、その辺のモンスターや夜盗がいくら束に", "translatedEnglishLine": "They had become strong enough to easily..." },{ "lineNumber": 258926, "originalJapaneseLine": "なって襲ってきても軽く撃退出来た。", "translatedEnglishLine": "repel even hordes of monsters or bandits attacking them." },{ "lineNumber": 258927, "originalJapaneseLine": "　", "translatedEnglishLine": "" },{ "lineNumber": 258928, "originalJapaneseLine": "そんな彼らの前に現れたは・・平原を埋め尽くす無数の兵隊", "translatedEnglishLine": "Before them appeared... countless soldiers filling the plains." },{ "lineNumber": 258929, "originalJapaneseLine": "タイガー将軍がディフェンダー、いや、東ヘルマンから呼び寄せた軍隊を指揮して現れた", "translatedEnglishLine": "General Tiger arrived commanding the army he summoned from Defender—no, from East Helman." },{ "lineNumber": 258930,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達が化け物な事はよくわかった、やはり人類の敵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s clear you’re monsters. You are truly enemies of humanity."},{"lineNumber":258931,"originalJapaneseLine":"３万ｖｓ10名ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"About 30,000 versus roughly 10."},{"lineNumber":258932,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":258933,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市の街道を移動中","translatedEnglishLine":"Traveling on the highway of the Free City."},{"lineNumber":258934,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的地は自由都市、Ｍランド","translatedEnglishLine":"Destination: Free City, M-Land."},{"lineNumber":258935,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんに紹介状を渡してオーブの在処を聞く事","translatedEnglishLine":"Hand over the letter of introduction to Mr. Copandon and ask about the whereabouts of the orb."},{"lineNumber":258936,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーブはこれが最期で５つ全部揃う","translatedEnglishLine":"This orb will be the last; all five will be assembled."},{"lineNumber":258937,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんはランスの子はいないのだろうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if Mr. Copandon has any children of Rance?"},{"lineNumber":258938,"originalJapaneseLine":"聞いた事はないけど、普通に考えて居るはずだよね","translatedEnglishLine":"I haven’t heard of any, but logically there should be some."},{"lineNumber":258939,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、ＪＡＰＡＮ、ＡＬ教、カラー族","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas, Zeth, Helman, JAPAN, AL cult, the Kara tribe,"},{"lineNumber":258940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほぼ全ての勢力の支配者にランスの子がいるし","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost every faction's ruler has a child of Rance."},{"lineNumber":258941,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンさんもランスと関係深い人って聞くし","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve heard Mr. Copandon is also closely connected to Rance."},{"lineNumber":258942,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぜひ仲間になってもらいたいよね","translatedEnglishLine":"We definitely want them to join our team."},{"lineNumber":258943,"originalJapaneseLine":"最期のオーブの情報を求めてＭランドに到着する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at M-Land seeking information on the final orb."},{"lineNumber":258944,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランドではコパンドンが迎えてくれる、クルックーからの紹介状を渡します","translatedEnglishLine":"At M-Land, Copandon welcomes them; we hand over the letter of introduction from Kuruccu."},{"lineNumber":258945,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに(46)なのに若々しいコパンドン　　世界滅亡から世界が立て直るように経済を支えた英雄","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon, already 46, yet youthful; a hero who supported the economy to rebuild the world after its destruction."},{"lineNumber":258946,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの子供達、かわいいなと歓迎してくれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He welcomes Rance’s children, telling them how cute they are."},{"lineNumber":258947,"originalJapaneseLine":"うちにもランスの子が居たらなぁ・・残念や、みんながんばってや","translatedEnglishLine":"I wish I had a child of Rance too... What a pity. Everyone, do your best."},{"lineNumber":258948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのいないんですか？と不躾な事を聞くだれか","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone rudely asks, \"So there isn’t one?\""},{ "lineNumber": 258949, "originalJapaneseLine": "　そうやねん、うう・・・しくしく", "translatedEnglishLine": "Yeah, that’s right... sob sob." },{ "lineNumber": 258950, "originalJapaneseLine": "　でもまだ諦めてへん、こうして若さを保つ努力してる", "translatedEnglishLine": "But I haven’t given up yet. I’m making efforts to keep my youth like this." },{ "lineNumber": 258951, "originalJapaneseLine": "　・・最期にランスに触れてもろたの・・でも、１０年以上前か・・はぁ・・・", "translatedEnglishLine": "…The last time I was touched by Rance... but that was over ten years ago... sigh…" }]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エールは男の場合、女の場合、どちらでも起こります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *The yells happen regardless of whether it's a man or a woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔真っ赤にして発情している、どうしよう、ぼく変・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My face is bright red from arousal. What should I do? Am I weird...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねぇしよっと迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, come on, let's do it, they press forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールもそれっぽい雰囲気でながされそうになるが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell is also about to be swayed by that kind of atmosphere, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか思いとどまり、レリコフを連れて裏路地を出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow managing to hold back, he takes Relikov and exits the back alley.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 売春街、酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red-light district, tavern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールとレリコフはみんなと合流する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and Relikov join up with everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが楽しそうにみんなに話しかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms happily talks to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、ほとんどやってないのかよ、お前達には早かったかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, you barely did anything? Maybe it was too soon for you guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれの反応。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each person's reaction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス　部屋まで入ったがなんだかんだいって出てきた。でもやったふりをする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu entered the room but somehow or other came back out. But he pretends he did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにボーイに連れられて日光が戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Nikkou returns, led by a boy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが聞く、どうだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms asks, "How was it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげさまで戻りました、うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you, I returned, blah blah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光が刀に変身する、折れてない、元に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou transforms into a sword; it’s not broken, it’s back to normal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが取ろうとするが、それを横からレリコフが取った。私持ちたいーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms tries to take it, but Relikov snatches it from the side saying, "I want to hold it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、びりっとして持てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it shocks me and I can’t hold it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが上機嫌でいう、日光を扱うには特別な儀式と修業がいるんだよ、君達にはまだ早い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms says cheerfully, "To wield Nikkou, a special ritual and training are needed. It’s still too early for you guys."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特にここで楽しめないような君達にはね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially for those like you who can’t even enjoy yourselves here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし持てたら、日光をあげるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you can hold it, I’ll give you Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうわれて、いろいろな者が試すが誰もうまくいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said that, various people try, but no one succeeds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、エールは持ててしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Yell was able to hold it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これらには日光もアームズも驚く、あれ・・どうして、儀式もしてないのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both Nikkou and Arms are surprised, "Huh... why? Even though no ritual was performed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが日光をアームズに返すが、アームズは受け取らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell returns Nikkou to Arms, but Arms does not take it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう君のだ、日光は私ではなく君を選んだのだ（大人拗ね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s already yours. Nikkou chose you, not me (adult sulking).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は物ではなく生命体だからな、私の所有物では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nikkou isn’t a thing but a living being. It’s not my possession.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたない、相性があまりよくなかったのは事実だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can’t be helped. The fact is our compatibility wasn’t that good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、魔剣カオスの方が私には似合ってそうだ、そちらを手に入れよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, the magic sword Chaos suits me better. I’ll get that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれからしばらくエール達は幾多の冒険をしてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Yell and the others have had numerous adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは日光を使える事でさらに強くなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell became even stronger by being able to use Nikkou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは十分に強くなっていた、その辺のモンスターや夜盗がいくら束に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had become strong enough to easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なって襲ってきても軽く撃退出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: repel even hordes of monsters or bandits attacking them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな彼らの前に現れたは・・平原を埋め尽くす無数の兵隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before them appeared... countless soldiers filling the plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイガー将軍がディフェンダー、いや、東ヘルマンから呼び寄せた軍隊を指揮して現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Tiger arrived commanding the army he summoned from Defender—no, from East Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達が化け物な事はよくわかった、やはり人類の敵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s clear you’re monsters. You are truly enemies of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３万ｖｓ10名ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30,000 versus roughly 10.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市の街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traveling on the highway of the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的地は自由都市、Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Destination: Free City, M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんに紹介状を渡してオーブの在処を聞く事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hand over the letter of introduction to Mr. Copandon and ask about the whereabouts of the orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブはこれが最期で５つ全部揃う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This orb will be the last; all five will be assembled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんはランスの子はいないのだろうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if Mr. Copandon has any children of Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いた事はないけど、普通に考えて居るはずだよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t heard of any, but logically there should be some.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、ＪＡＰＡＮ、ＡＬ教、カラー族
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas, Zeth, Helman, JAPAN, AL cult, the Kara tribe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ全ての勢力の支配者にランスの子がいるし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Almost every faction's ruler has a child of Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンさんもランスと関係深い人って聞くし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve heard Mr. Copandon is also closely connected to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひ仲間になってもらいたいよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We definitely want them to join our team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期のオーブの情報を求めてＭランドに到着する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at M-Land seeking information on the final orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドではコパンドンが迎えてくれる、クルックーからの紹介状を渡します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At M-Land, Copandon welcomes them; we hand over the letter of introduction from Kuruccu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに(46)なのに若々しいコパンドン　　世界滅亡から世界が立て直るように経済を支えた英雄
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon, already 46, yet youthful; a hero who supported the economy to rebuild the world after its destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの子供達、かわいいなと歓迎してくれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He welcomes Rance’s children, telling them how cute they are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちにもランスの子が居たらなぁ・・残念や、みんながんばってや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish I had a child of Rance too... What a pity. Everyone, do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのいないんですか？と不躾な事を聞くだれか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone rudely asks, "So there isn’t one?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうやねん、うう・・・しくしく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that’s right... sob sob.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもまだ諦めてへん、こうして若さを保つ努力してる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I haven’t given up yet. I’m making efforts to keep my youth like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・最期にランスに触れてもろたの・・でも、１０年以上前か・・はぁ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: …The last time I was touched by Rance... but that was over ten years ago... sigh…
